Sentencas: The electrochemical reduction of molecular oxygen is a fundamental process in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and requires high efficiency cathode materials.
Titulo: Peculiar Properties of the La0.25Ba0.25Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite as Oxygen Reduction Electrocatalyst

Sentencas: Two La0.25Ba0.25Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta-based perovskite compounds were prepared by solution combustion synthesis, and characterized for their structural, microstructural, surface, redox and electrochemical properties as potential cathodes in comparison with Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta and La0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta perovskites.
Titulo: Peculiar Properties of the La0.25Ba0.25Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite as Oxygen Reduction Electrocatalyst

Sentencas: Results highlighted that calcination at 900 degrees C led to a bi-perovskite heterostructure, where two different perovskite structures coexist, whereas at higher calcination temperatures a single-phase perovskite was formed.
Titulo: Peculiar Properties of the La0.25Ba0.25Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite as Oxygen Reduction Electrocatalyst

Sentencas: The results showed the effectiveness of the preparation procedures in co-doping the A-site of perovskites with barium and lanthanum as a strategy to optimize the cathode's properties.
Titulo: Peculiar Properties of the La0.25Ba0.25Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite as Oxygen Reduction Electrocatalyst

Sentencas: The formation of nanometric heterostructure co-doped in the A-site evidenced an improvement in oxygen vacancies' availability and in the redox properties, which promoted both processes: oxygen adsorption and oxygen ions drift, through the cathode material, to the electrolyte.
Titulo: Peculiar Properties of the La0.25Ba0.25Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite as Oxygen Reduction Electrocatalyst

Sentencas: A reduction in the total resistance was observed in the case of heterostructured material.
Titulo: Peculiar Properties of the La0.25Ba0.25Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite as Oxygen Reduction Electrocatalyst
